Texts.Eng: Ancient ruins such as this can be found throughout the galaxy. I'm detecting a spatial anomaly nearby... Perhaps some form of teleportation device?

I am detecting entities attracted by the moon's erchius deposits. Their interest in you will grow as you collect more fuel. I would define these entities as 'intractably deadly'. I salute your fearlessness.
It may be worth noting that this location has no atmosphere and that you are slowly suffocating. I suggest you leave, and return when you have crafted a breathing EPP.
The console in this room is configured to alter the Tech abilities you have equipped. Interacting with it will allow you to install new Tech.

WARNING! RADIATION LEVELS ON THIS PLANET ARE EXTREMELY HAZARDOUS!
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

WARNING! TEMPERATURE ON THIS PLANET IS DANGEROUSLY HIGH!
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

WARNING! TEMPERATURE ON THIS PLANET IS DANGEROUSLY LOW!
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!
